travelFoodBlog.restaurantDescription: A very popular place in the center of Warsaw. Prosty Temat offers a welcoming atmosphere and a diverse menu. Totally recommend this place, but definitely need to make a reservation before.

food.name: PIZZA PIDE
food.description: We tried PIDE HONGOS and PIDE TARTUFO CON CHORIZO. They were realy tasty and with a variety of toppings to choose from.

food.name: CLASSIC FISH & CHIPS
food.description: The batter was perfectly crispy and the fish was juicy and tender.

food.name: VERY BERRY COCTAIL
food.description: The coctail was a perfecion of sweet and sour.

travelFoodBlog.restaurantDescription: Modern, intimate setting with exceptionally friendly staff and good food.

food.name: CHEESE AND MEAT PLATE
food.description: This plate was not on the menu but we asked for it separately and it was excellent. The honey-mustard sauce was so good that we asked for the recipe.

food.name: HOVADZI BURGER
food.description: A masterclass in flavor and texture, featuring a handcrafted, juicy beef patty that was grilled to perfection

food.name: GRILOVANE KUSKY LOSOSA TAGLIATELLE
food.description: This mushroom rissotto was cooked to perfection. All dishes were amazing and we would definitely go back to this place.
